trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes input device gestures.
trans-unit.target: Classe astratta che descrive i movimenti di dispositivo di input.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of InputGesture in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Le implementazioni di InputGesture in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] sono <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: An input gesture can be associated with a command so that when the gesture is performed the command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Un movimento di input pu√≤ essere associato a un comando in modo che quando viene eseguita l'azione viene richiamato il comando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> and the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> matches the input associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> corrisponde all'input associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The input event data to compare this gesture to.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento di input per confrontare questo movimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the gesture matches the input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il movimento corrisponde l'input. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
